scripts.postbuild: node -e "const fs=require('fs');const path=require('path');const cwd=process.cwd();const source=path.join(cwd,'.next');const rm=(p)=>{if(fs.existsSync(p))fs.rmSync(p,{recursive:true,force:true});};rm(path.join(source,'cache'));rm(path.join(source,'dev'));const ensure=(p)=>fs.mkdirSync(p,{recursive:true});const copy=(from,to)=>{if(!fs.existsSync(from))return;ensure(to);for(const entry of fs.readdirSync(from)){fs.cpSync(path.join(from,entry),path.join(to,entry),{recursive:true});}};const hasWorkspaces=(pkgPath)=>{try{const pkg=JSON.parse(fs.readFileSync(pkgPath,'utf8'));return Array.isArray(pkg.workspaces)&&pkg.workspaces.includes('frontend');}catch{return false;}};const targets=[cwd];const parent=path.resolve(cwd,'..');const parentPkg=path.join(parent,'package.json');if(hasWorkspaces(parentPkg))targets.push(parent);for(const root of targets){const target=path.join(root,'.next');if(path.resolve(target)===path.resolve(source))continue;copy(source,target);} "
